description: The buyer, Alex, commissioned video editing work from the seller, Jamie, who delivered the final project on time. However, Alex argues that the video quality does not meet the agreed standards as per the contract, while Jamie insists that the work meets all the specified criteria.

evidenceSpecs.name: Video_Editing_Contract.pdf
evidenceSpecs.description: Contract between Alex (buyer) and Jamie (seller) for video editing services.
evidenceSpecs.content: [{"heading":"PARTIES","body":"This contract is between Alex Johnson (Buyer) and Jamie Lee (Seller) for video editing services."},{"heading":"SCOPE OF WORK","body":"Edit a 15-minute HD video with specific transitions and effects, audio leveling, color grading, delivery in MP4 format."},{"heading":"COMPENSATION","body":"Total payment is 2000 LOB, payable in two installments of 1000 LOB each: 50% upfront and 50% upon approval of the final deliverable."},{"heading":"TIMELINE","body":"Final video to be delivered by February 20, 2026."},{"heading":"ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA","body":"Video must contain at least four specified types of transitions, adhere to agreed audio levels, correct color grading, and no visual artifacts."},{"heading":"QUALITY STANDARDS","body":"The video should not have any visual glitches or distorted audio, as significant imperfections will lead to non-acceptance."}]

evidenceSpecs.content: Realistic screenshot, high detail, sharp text, modern UI design; split screen comparison of two HD video frames, left frame with desired color accuracy and right frame with color distortion, playback bar at bottom, timestamp showing 0:12 in both frames, central UI pause button.

analysisPrompt: Evaluate the quality standards clause in the PDF and compare the visual evidence provided in the image. Cross-check the timeline and payment status in the CSV for any deviations.
gradingRubric:
Identify the agreed quality standards for the video in the PDF and note any deviances.
Examine the image evidence for the presence of visual glitches contrary to the contract.
Verify the delivery date in the CSV and ensure it aligns with the contract timeline.
Check that the final payment is pending due to non-acceptance of work quality.
Validate the timeline section to confirm the delivery requirements were met in terms of date.
Ensure that the quality issues are significant enough as per the contract to withhold payment approval.
Conclude that Buyer rightfully withheld payment due to unmet quality standards.
